mapper.update:
update site_monitoring
siteName = #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ad = #{ad,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deviceID = #{deviceID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recordingTime = #{recordingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
moniTime = #{moniTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
equipmentState = #{equipmentState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
communicationStatus = #{communicationStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dataSource = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reservedAIN1 = #{reservedAIN1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accumulatedRainfall = #{accumulatedRainfall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rainfallIntensity = #{rainfallIntensity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
five_minuteRainfall = #{five_minuteRainfall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rainfallDuring = #{rainfallDuring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dailyPrecipitation = #{dailyPrecipitation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ten_dayRainfall = #{ten_dayRainfall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
monthlyRainfall = #{monthlyRainfall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valueCOD = #{valueCOD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zdz = #{zdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valueTOC = #{valueTOC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
probeTemperature = #{probeTemperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
atmosphericPressure = #{atmosphericPressure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batteryPercentage = #{batteryPercentage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
externalVoltage = #{externalVoltage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pressure = #{pressure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
depth = #{depth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rjy = #{rjy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oxygenPartialPressure = #{oxygenPartialPressure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zd = #{zd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ddl = #{ddl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salinity = #{salinity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalDissolvedSolid = #{totalDissolvedSolid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resistivity = #{resistivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waterDensity = #{waterDensity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ph = #{ph,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
potentialREDOX = #{potentialREDOX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rainGaugeFault = #{rainGaugeFault,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rainClearAddress = #{rainClearAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
communicationFailureCODanalyzer = #{communicationFailureCODanalyzer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waterQualityAnalyzer = #{waterQualityAnalyzer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waterUpLevelAlarm = #{waterUpLevelAlarm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waterDownLevelAlarm = #{waterDownLevelAlarm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doorSwitch = #{doorSwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
powerDetect = #{powerDetect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
faultAIN1 = #{faultAIN1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upperLimitAlarmAIN1 = #{upperLimitAlarmAIN1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lowerLimitAlarmAIN1 = #{lowerLimitAlarmAIN1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waterLevelState = #{waterLevelState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waterLevel = #{waterLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
